title: 加州橡树岭高中社会学实验课堂

action: Sit quietly at desk, observe classroom and teacher
thoughts: First day of this sociology experiment. I should pay close attention to the rules and follow instructions carefully to make a good impression. The uniforms and flags make this feel very official.
memory: Noticed strict classroom setup with flags and uniforms
Preparing to follow all rules carefully

action: Maintain proper posture while observing teacher's reaction to whispering
thoughts: The whispering is risky - we're supposed to follow rules strictly. I hope the teacher didn't notice or there might be consequences for everyone's discipline scores.
memory: Maintaining proper posture to avoid attention

action: Maintain raised hand and eye contact with teacher while awaiting response
thoughts: I hope the teacher acknowledges my question about the group competition rules. It's better to focus on positive classroom activities rather than dwelling on the earlier rule-breaking. Following proper procedure shows respect for authority.
memory: Maintained proper classroom etiquette while asking question
Awaiting teacher's response about group competition rules
Demonstrating respect for authority through proper procedures

action: Nod in understanding and prepare notebook for group competition details
thoughts: The teacher explained the competition rules clearly. I should make sure I understand everything perfectly to contribute well to my group and avoid any disciplinary issues. Following rules properly will help maintain good standing.
memory: Received clear explanation of group competition rules
Preparing to participate properly in upcoming competition
Maintaining rule-following behavior to ensure social acceptance
